arcade.agent.module

Class MetabolismSimple

  • java.lang.Object
    • arcade.agent.module.Metabolism
      • arcade.agent.module.MetabolismSimple
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Module, java.io.Serializable

    public class MetabolismSimple
extends Metabolism
    Extension of Metabolism for simple metabolism.

    MetabolismSimple assumes a constant glucose uptake rate and constant ATP production rate. Ratio of ATP production that needs to be produced through glycolysis or oxidative phosphorylation is controlled by the META_PREF parameter.

    MetabolismSimple will increase cell mass (using specified fraction of internal glucose) if cell is dividing and less than double in size.

    Since:
    2.2
    Version:
    2.3.4
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Constructor Detail

      • MetabolismSimple

        public MetabolismSimple(Cell c,
                        Simulation sim)
        Creates a simple Metabolism module.

        Module only has internal glucose. Metabolic preference (META_PREF) parameter is drawn from a Parameter distribution and the distribution is updated with the new mean.

        Parameters:
        c - the TissueCell the module is associated with
        sim - the simulation instance

      • updateModule

        public void updateModule(Module mod,
                         double f)
        Description copied from interface: Module
        Updates the module object with the given Module object.

        The value f is used to indicate fractional reduction in the relevant values for the daughter cell relative to the parent cell.

        Parameters:
        mod - the reference Module instance
        f - the fractional reduction
